title: FujiFilm X-T20 + FujiFilm XF 14mm f/2.8, ISO 500, f/14, 1/500 s
text: This was a fun day, I didn't take many photos though.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Canon FD 75-200mm f/4.5, ISO 1600, f/11, 1/250 s
text: I haven't used this lens properly in the years I've had it. I will be on Friday, so better to get some practice in.

title: Canon Powershot G10, ISO 80, f/4.5, 1/500 s
text: Horses.

title: Canon Powershot G10, ISO 400, f/4, 1/400 s
text: A display in a windmill.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + FujiFilm XF 27mm f/2.8, ISO 2000, f/4, 1/60 s
text: Almost forgot to take something..

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + FujiFilm XF 14mm f/2.8, ISO 1600, f/20, 1/640 s
text: There was a lovely sunset over the sea.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + FujiFilm XF 27mm f/2.8, ISO 200, f/8, 1/30 s
text: A bit of a lazy one before I go away for a week.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Canon FD 50mm f/1.4, ISO 250, f/8, 1/180 s
text: This is the first time I've used these FD lenses with this adapter, I don't really know why, they're great lenses.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Tamron 90mm f/2.5 SP, ISO 200, f/?, 1/250 s
text: I quite like these flowers.

title: Canon Powershot G10, ISO 400, f/2.8, 1/30 s
text: Now this is a throwaway.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + FujiFilm XF 27mm f/2.8, ISO 200, f/9, 1/500 s
text: I thought this would be a bit of a throwaway, but I quite like how it turned out..

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + FujiFilm XF 27mm f/2.8, ISO 200, f/2.8, 1/2000 s
text: I was testing my Canon FD 28mm f/2.8 today. It recently got repaired, and I'm putting a roll of XP2 to see how it goes. I did do some trichromes on the roll as well.

title: Canon Powershot G10, ISO 100, f/4, 1/73 s
text: I think this is a honey bee? Or a hover fly? Either way it's another insect enjoying the garden.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Tamron 90mm f/2.5 SP + Tamron 2x Teleconverter, ISO 800, f/?, 1/500 s
text: I am still alive. I really like this photo, they were out there all day at the same flowers.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + FujiFilm XF 27mm f/2.8, ISO 800, f/8, 1/125 s
text: I like reflections.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Tamron 90mm f/2.5 SP + Tamron 2x Teleconverter, ISO 1600, f/?, 1/180 s
text: Again, at least it's something...

title: Canon Powershot SX540 HS, ISO 1600, f/4, 1/60 s
text: At least I shot something.

title: Canon Powershot G10, ISO 800, f/4.5, 1/200 s
text: I'm not doing so well.

title: Canon Powershot G10, ISO 80, f/3.2, 1/60 s
text: I like how this thing looks.

title: Canon Powershot SX540 HS, ISO 400, f/4.5, 1/125 s
text: I haven't used this in a while.

title: Canon Powershot G10, ISO 200, f/4, 1/125 s
text: Yeah.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + FujiFilm XF 27mm f/2.8, ISO 800, f/8, 1/500 s
text: The sky was very blue so I thought a red filter would look interesting.

title: FujiFilm X-T20 + Konica Hexanon AR 40mm f/1.8, ISO 800, f/?, 1/125 s
text: Here's day 100, surprised I got here.

title: Canon Powershot G10, ISO 400, f/2.8, 1/8 s
text: Day 100 tomorrow huh. I'll be writing another retrospective post, and I don't think it is going to be very positive.

title: Canon Powershot G10, ISO 100, f/2.8, 1/8 s
text: I had more photos I wanted to take today but people kept getting in the way.

title: Canon Powershot G10, ISO 80, f/4, 1/159 s
text: Flowers in our own garden.

title: Canon Powershot G10, ISO 800, f/2.8, 1/51s
text: We did more developing today. I'll write a post when the scans are done

title: Canon Powershot G10, ISO 80, f/4, 1/974 s
text: These were looking very sad a few days ago, but seem to be doing better now.

title: Canon Powershot G10, ISO 80, f/3.1, 1/102 s
text: I'm a bit worried about these flowers. I've seen multiple of them bloom and wither over the course of a single day. Maybe that's normal for them.

title: Canon Powershot G10, ISO 80, f/3.5, 1/20 s
text: I don't remember much of this one, but I'd like to go back to it and try again properly.

title: Canon Powershot G10, ISO 80, f/3.1, 1/31 s
text: Lots of flowers over the next few days.
